story: Founded in Chennai, 369 Fitness Wellness was born from a vision to revolutionize fitness and wellness in South India. We believe that true transformation happens when you combine physical strength, mental resilience, and holistic wellness.
mission: Our mission is to empower individuals to achieve their best selves through expert guidance, community support, and a comprehensive approach to health. We combine strength training, endurance building, wellness practices, and mindfulness to create lasting change.
